management_guidance_audit: The management has provided forward-looking statements indicating potential impacts of macroeconomic conditions and COVID-19 on future performance. They emphasize the importance of monitoring economic indicators and adjusting strategies accordingly.
key_risks_evidence: Macroeconomic Risks | Global economic conditions can adversely affect demand for Apple's products and services. | APPLE_2022_10K.pdf | 5717c09acc0bebbe
COVID-19 Impact | The pandemic has caused significant disruptions, affecting operations and financial performance. | APPLE_2021_10K.pdf | 402cb3b462d665f8
Supply Chain Risks | Disruptions in the supply chain can impact production and delivery of products. | APPLE_2022_10K.pdf | 5717c09acc0bebbe
